channel.title: pypy on Jürgen Gmach
channel.description: Recent content in pypy on Jürgen Gmach

item.title: How Many Zope Repositories Are Compatible With Pypy?
item.description: Today, Johannes Raggam asked on the Plone/Zope community forum whether Zope is able to run on PyPy. While I am not entirely sure, and I have some vague memories about potential problems with RestrictedPython, I can certainly grep the almost 300 Zope repositories for signs of PyPy support. The best sign of PyPy support is IMHO that we run tests for it :-) In order to grep in all repositories I use all-repos written by Anthony Sottile.
